span.p: Based on the recommendation by Gov. Beshear to discontinue in-house school activities, THERE WILL BE NO ON-CAMPUS ACTIVITIES FOR EBIS FROM MAR. 16th THRU MAY 1st. Instruction during this time will consist of non-traditional instruction (NTI) days. The week of March 30-April 3 is scheduled as Spring Break for the district. NTI DAYS AND THE SCHOOL YEAR WILL END MAY 1st, 2020.
